DOC.brief_title: Improving Symptoms Schizophrenia Schizoaffective Disorder Supplementing Medications With Pravastatin
DOC.detailed_description: This study supplement patient ' current medication Pravastatin , cholesterol-lowering medication , try improve residual symptom also improve cognitive functioning . It consist 15 total study visit 28-week period time , one visit every 2 week . Blood draw do every 4 week throughout study monitor lipid level , C-Reactive protein , AST , ALT , CPK Total . Cognitive testing complete begin study end study . During study visit , staff monitoring vitals sign ( weight , height , blood pressure , pulse , waist/hip ratio ) , possible side effect , positive negative symptom , mood symptom , overall functioning .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder Male female subject ; age 1865 year inclusive Ability provide inform consent No psychiatric hospitalization last 30 day prior randomization PANSS score study entry 80 120 inclusive , OR continue experience residual positive and/or negative symptom baseline level functioning .
